boardgame.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: The Game
boardgame.description: Now it's up to you to help Buffy and her friends stop the spread of Evil in Sunnydale! Which villain and his minions will plague the town? The Master? The Judge? The Mayor? Or Adam? Each game recreates one of Buffy's four most exciting challenges... use your own strength and skill to outwit them all! Patrol the board. Collect cards and gain power. Roll dice to fight and cast spells. Finally, rid Sunnydale of Evil to win! But don't slack... or Evil will slay you first! Comes with gameboard, pewter Buffy icon, Phases Chart centerpiece, 5 Good Player _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; 13 Evil Player pawns and stands, 84 Evil, Weapon, Research, Help _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Artifact cards, 4 Villain tiles, 4 Good Player cardholders, 1 Evil card stand, 10 dice, 10 life counters._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Same theme and nearly identical name, but a different game from Buffy the Vampire Slayer: The Board Game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Mint in shrink.
This game was a preorder.
MINT in shrink-wrap
This game has been played twice. While the bottom of the box has taken some minor water damage, the game pieces and the rest of the box are in near mint condition.

What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s bad: The box. It has lid crushing, tape, cup rings, etc. The cards show some wear and tear, but are not seriously bent or marked. What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s missing: The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;phase of the moon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; cardboard standup. What will be included is a printout of said standup, and I can even forward you a jpeg of it so you can make an even better one if you want. Also, one of the plastic stands that hold this cutout is missing, though there are still three. All of the vamps are there, all of the cards, the Buffy pewter marker, the Evil card holder, all of the dice, all of the player mats, etc. So the game is playable, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s just not in terrific shape, hence the low low price! Pictures available upon request.
Box a little dinged. Complete.

The game is opened, and the box has moderate shelf wear; with some scuffed edges and corners, and creases at the corners of the top and bottom. However, that is the ONLY wear to the game, so the condition should really be considered better than very good. Inside all the components are FACTORY SEALED! All the cardboard pieces are UNPUNCHED! The stickers used to make the die are still on their sheet. The factory insert is also still present. Nothing has ever been used! So you get an absolutely, brand new game that only has shelf wear to the outside packaging. Offers will also be considered.

When I bought the game, it was the last copy in the toy store where I found it. However, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s really in great condition considering this. There is a very slight rip in the paper on the cover in one corner - probably measure just a few millimeters. Some dents on the cover and box bottom, in the corners, which is not unusual for cheaply-produced mass market US games. Everything else is in great condition, and I only played it a couple of times. I prefer paypal, but will also accept check or money order (though it will be slower). I ship by USPS parcel post with delivery confirmation. If it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s not much of a difference in price, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll go priority. If you order several games from me, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll combine shipping. Shipping cost is $6 to anywhere in the US (probably more if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re in Alaska or Hawaii, but I have no experience in that area). This game is unpunched... probably due to being jostled around a bit some of the boards have come out of their places, but the majority are still firmly attached. All punch boards are present with all boards in place. The die are still in the sealed bag, stickers on original page, and components still sealed also. The cards are split into two decks... not sure if they were originally in wrap or not. The game has never been played, so the board is perfect as well. Unfortunately the box had some sort of accident and has two torn corners on one of the short sides of the box. With some inside corner work, the box would look in nice condition as there is minor damage to the box besides the tears. I am listing this as Like New even though the box will make it not look that way, but due to the game being unpunched and the components unbagged I put it into this category. The game comes from a smoke and animal free environment. Thanks for looking! Feel free to contact me with futher details on the game conditions. I would keep and play it if I didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have so many games and if I was into this genre. Shipping to anywhere in the continental US: $13

It is the phase track and all of the thick cardboard components. These 2 sheets are unpunched (after a brief period of playing the game constantly, my kids lost interest and it was never played with again). I will send these with all of the original components.
